system.description: You gain proficiency with checks using a forgery kit. If you are already proficient with checks using a forgery kit, you instead gain an expertise die. In addition, you have numerous false pieces of identification (a mix of real and fictional identities). You can present your fake identification to make a prestige check (using your normal prestige value) to convince someone you are one of these fake identities in order to gain an audience or call in a favor. You may add your expertise die (if any) on checks using forgery kits to this roll. Anyone who is suspicious of your identification can attempt to detect the forgery by making an Investigation check with a DC equal to your passive check using a forgery kit (10 + proficiency + your Dexterity modifier + 3 if you have an expertise die).
